* The Welsh Government has been working with the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) to review the progress of the Welsh education system.
 * The OECD will publish their latest report on Welsh education on 23 March 2020, and the Welsh Government Minister for Education intends to make a statement to the Chamber on 24 March 2020.
 * The OECD review is part of the Welsh Government's ongoing development of self-evaluation, to ensure that they are constantly testing themselves and not just accepting their own orthodoxy.
 * The School Standards and Organisation (Wales) Act 2013 gives local authorities extensive powers of intervention in schools. However, the use of these powers has been mixed, with some local authorities using them more than others.
 * The Welsh Government has introduced a national evaluation and improvement resource to help schools evaluate their strengths, weaknesses, and areas for improvement. This resource is being developed in co-construction with the OECD, middle tier, and practitioners to ensure that it is useful and practical for schools.
 * The national evaluation and improvement resource is part of a whole-system approach to self-evaluation, which the Welsh Government hopes will be adopted by local education authorities, regional school improvement services, and Welsh Government.
 * The Welsh Government has invested PS100 million in school standards in this Assembly term, with 50% of it directed towards professional learning for teaching professionals. This investment is intended to support the professional learning of staff and improve the quality of teaching in schools.
 * The Welsh Government has also introduced a new approach to supporting schools that are causing concern, including a multi-agency panel to work with the school and provide additional support. This approach has been positively received so far, and is being evaluated by Cardiff Metropolitan University and Swansea University.

1. The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) is still involved in the Welsh Government's school improvement journey, providing external verification of the system's progress and self-evaluation.
2. The School Standards and Organisation (Wales) Act 2013 gives local authorities extensive powers of intervention in schools, but their use varies. The Welsh Government encourages proactive approaches to intervention and believes local authorities are best placed to do so.
3. The national evaluation and improvement resource is being developed to promote robust self-evaluation in schools, with the aim of improving skills in this area and creating continuity across Wales. The resource is being tested and evaluated, with a planned introduction in September 2020.
4. Investment in school standards has been significant during this Assembly term, with 50% of the money going towards professional learning for teaching professionals. The impact of this investment is difficult to measure directly due to the complexity of the education budget and the various factors influencing school performance.

1. * The scene opens with a janitor mopping the floor in the Leizig Aerospace Headquarters in Berlin, Germany.
2. * Two men, speaking in German, approach the janitor and greet him before entering an elevator.
3. * The janitor turns on a communication device in his ear and alerts the head of the operation that the men are in the elevator.
4. * The head of the operation activates a charge that causes the elevator to plummet down the shaft, but it stops on the 13th floor and is carried away by a helicopter.
5. * The scene shifts to Los Angeles, where Sydney is undergoing a test to determine if she is still under the influence of brainwashing techniques.
6. * Jack informs Sydney that she killed a man named Lazarey, but she doesn't remember the incident.
7. * Sydney expresses her desire to find out what happened to her during the past two years, but Jack is hesitant to involve the CIA.
8. * The CIA has received a ransom demand from a group called the Covenant, who have kidnapped two agents and are demanding the release of a man named Sark.
9. * Sydney is tasked with retrieving a package from a theater in Munich, but instead finds the severed head of one of the kidnapped agents.
10. * The scene ends with the CIA preparing to trade Sark for the remaining hostage, despite Sydney's objections.

1. Booth and Brennan are sent to a therapist, Dr. Sweets, after Booth arrests Brennan's father and the FBI considers severing their partnership.
2. At a crime scene, they discover a cooked body and determine that the victim was killed before being cooked. The body was moved from Florida, where pineapples were grown in a hot house.
3. They investigate a local farmer, Lyndon Page, who grows pineapples and has a hot house. Page confirms that Frank Curtis visited him once for advice on maximizing sun exposure.
4. They find out that Frank Curtis was having an affair with another farmer's wife, and his wife stood to gain the most from his death.
5. They discover a second body in a compost pile, a young woman who was stabbed to death. The woman is identified as Emma Billings, a cashier at one of Frank Curtis's Natural Sun Markets in New Jersey.
6. They arrest Noel Liftan, Emma's stalker, but realize he didn't kill Frank Curtis. They later find out that Kat Curtis, Frank's daughter, killed Emma Billings and her father in a fit of jealousy and to protect her mother.

1. Phoebe, Piper, and Prue are at a bar when they notice a man sitting alone. Prue suspects that their friend Prue stood him up, but Piper thinks she's been preoccupied with work and demon hunting.
2. Prue has been researching a demon that the triad sent to kill them in the past. She traces his ancestors and finds an entire history of the village they visited.
3. The man, Sean, is still waiting at the bar when Prue calls to apologize. She tells him she got hung up at work and will make it up to him.
4. When Prue returns home, she finds that all the mirrors in the house have been smashed. She suspects a demon is responsible, but Darryl, a police officer, suggests it could be a human stalker.
5. Prue becomes increasingly fixated on the triad and the demon she believes they sent. She demands that Leo, a guardian angel, tell her everything he knows about the triad.
6. Meanwhile, Cole, a demon working with the triad, is assigned assistance in his mission to kill the Charmed Ones. He is skeptical when the triad tells him they are sending another demon.
7. Prue sets a trap for the demon in the attic, and when it is triggered, she and her sisters discover it is Cole. They are shocked and apologize, but Cole is angry and threatens to have them arrested.
8. Later, Prue is attacked by another demon, Troxa, who reveals that there is another demon, Belthazor, who is also after the Charmed Ones. Leo tells them that Belthazor is a powerful and evil demon.
9. Prue realizes that if someone hadn't turned on the air conditioning and opened all the windows, she never would have seen Troxa. She suspects that there is another guardian angel helping them.

* Cole has a dream where he sees himself as the Source, who tells him that they are now one and that he cannot change his fate.
 * The Seer tells Cole that the Source's death has caused chaos in the underworld and that they must stop Kurzon from taking over the throne. She also tells him that the Charmed Ones are the only ones who can vanquish Kurzon.

• Terri, a high school student, feels insecure about her weight and believes that boys do not find her attractive.
• Terri's father tries to boost her confidence and encourages her to attend a school dance, but Terri is hesitant.
• Spinner, a popular boy at school, asks Terri for class notes and shows interest in her, but Terri does not believe he is sincere.
• Terri's friends, Ashley and Paige, try to help her feel more confident and offer to give her a makeover before the dance.
• At the dance, Terri becomes drunk and makes a scene, causing her friends to worry about her.
• Spinner dances with Terri, but she becomes sick and vomits in the bathroom.
• The next day at school, Terri is embarrassed about her behavior at the dance and avoids Spinner. Spinner moves on and starts using Paige's notes instead.

<summary>

* Rachel is upset with Ross for not telling her that they are still married.
* Ross didn't get an annulment because he couldn't face another failed marriage.
* Joey finds keys to a Porsche and assumes they are his.
* Phoebe asks Monica and Chandler to babysit Frank and Alice's triplets.
* Rachel and Phoebe decide to be roommates while Denise is out of town.
* Ross and Rachel file for an annulment but are denied and must file for divorce instead.
* Chandler swallows a sonic blaster gun from an action figure and needs medical attention.
* Monica and Phoebe leave Joey alone with the "babies" to take Chandler to the hospital.
* Joey is still pretending to own a Porsche and gets angry when the valet doesn't bring it back.
* Rachel and Ross are still arguing and Rachel reveals that getting married was her idea.

</summary>

1. Frasier is getting ready for a date with Donna, an art/park director, while Daphne, Martin, and Niles watch movies. The movie they are watching, "Casablanca," sparks a conversation about sacrifice and love.
2. Frasier receives a call from Niles, who has rented movies and wants to come over. Niles brings "The Way We Were" and "Casablanca," but Martin reveals the VCR is broken. Niles has the movies fixed and brings them over anyway.
3. Frasier's date with Donna is interrupted when he receives a call from Kate, who is leaving for Chicago. Frasier rushes to Kate's apartment to tell her how he feels, but finds another man there.
4. Frasier returns home to find Donna still waiting. He tells her the truth about his feelings for Kate and leaves to be with her.
5. Frasier rushes to the airport to stop Kate from getting on her flight to Chicago. They declare their love for each other, but Kate's flight is delayed, and Frasier has to work.
6. Frasier and Kate say goodbye, but as Kate boards her flight, it is delayed due to technical difficulties. They reunite and decide to spend the night together in Chicago.

1. Frasier and Niles visit a day spa called La Porte D'Argent after receiving an invitation, but are initially denied entry because they are not on the list of members.
2. Frasier and Niles are eventually able to enter the spa after Niles pretends to be Cam Winston and the receptionist believes them.
3. Frasier and Niles enjoy various spa treatments, but are disappointed to learn that there is a higher level of membership (gold) that they do not have access to.
4. Frasier and Niles become obsessed with gaining access to the gold level and try to find a way to do so.
5. Roz helps Frasier and Niles get in touch with Senator Ogden, who they have seen going into the gold level of the spa.
6. The episode ends with Senator Ogden having a medical emergency at Cafe Nervosa, where Roz is giving him CPR.

1. * Lorelai tells her mother Emily that she is getting married to Max, but Emily dismisses it and says she hopes they'll be in town for the wedding.
2. * Lorelai is upset and tells Rory about it, who is also stressed out about not having enough extracurricular activities to impress Harvard.
3. * Rory decides to start volunteering and organizing her extracurricular activities, causing her to cancel plans with Dean.
4. * Dean gets mad and they get into a fight, with Dean accusing Rory of not having time for him anymore.
5. * Lorelai goes to Emily's house to talk to her about her reaction to the engagement, but Emily accuses Lorelai of being hysterical and dismisses her feelings.
6. * Lorelai and Emily get into a heated argument, with Lorelai expressing her hurt and frustration at Emily's lack of enthusiasm and care for her life events.

• Casey and Ashleigh are holding a slumber party for their sorority sisters, which is interrupted by Rebecca telling ghost stories. Casey and Rebecca argue over the legitimacy of the ghost story and Casey's motivations for the slumber party.

• Meanwhile, at Kappa Tau house, Cappie is trying to have a romantic evening with a girl named Destiny, but is interrupted by Rusty who tells him that the girl is not who she says she is and has been lying to them. Destiny admits to Cappie that she has had a crush on him since they were at camp together ten years ago and has been working on getting in shape to have a second chance with him.

• A man is talking about the importance of forgiveness in life.
• George is trying to find Izzie and talk to her, while Callie is looking for George.
• Derek is trying to convince Meredith to go on a weekend trip with him.
• Meredith and Cristina are discussing Lexie and how she is trying to get in good with the attendings.
• George, Bailey, and Callie are discussing Ruthie's treatment options for her broken ankle.
• Richard is trying to convince Camille to undergo treatment for her ovarian cancer.
• Izzie and Alex are discussing Izzie's fight with Callie.
• George is trying to stop Callie from fighting with Izzie.
• The man is reflecting on the importance of forgiveness and moving on from past wrongs.

• Ty has taken a job at a wildlife reserve after his previous job at Scott's veterinary clinic became uncertain.
• Poachers are a threat to the wildlife at the reserve, and Ty wants to stop them.
• A wolf pup is being taken to a sanctuary using the soft-release method, where it can gradually adjust to the wild.
• Jack and Georgie bring a horse to Heartland, and Amy helps to train it.
• Lou asks Jade to stay at Heartland for a few days and help out with some chores, including babysitting Katie.
• Ty and Bob, the owner of the wildlife reserve, discuss the poachers and how to handle them.
• Ty finds two dead bears killed by poachers and calls Scott for help in tracking down the poachers' baiting stations.

1. <summary>Ted wants to call his ex-girlfriend Natalie after he starts to appreciate things he didn't like before, such as a shirt he used to dislike and bourbon. He believes that there might be someone from his past who he thought was wrong for him but is actually a perfect fit.</summary>
2. <summary>Ted's friends suggest a few names of his ex-girlfriends, but Ted is particularly interested in Natalie. However, Barney, one of Ted's friends, ends their friendship after learning that Ted once dated a porn star.</summary>
3. <summary>Robin, another friend of Ted, gets promoted to the City Hall beat but faces a dilemma when her boss asks her to cover a story at City Hall. She says "nipple" on live news to get Barney's attention, who offers her money to say "booger" on air.</summary>
4. <summary>Ted calls Natalie, but she hangs up on him. Ted then visits her apartment with a sock monkey, and they have sex. Ted and Natalie start dating again, but Ted realizes that he is not in love with her. He decides to break up with her, but his friends advise him against it, saying that there is no good way to break up with someone.</summary>
5. <summary>Ted takes Natalie out for dinner to break up with her. However, he learns that it is her birthday, and he didn't get her anything. Natalie says that Ted has already given her the best present by making her trust again. Ted breaks up with her, and Natalie throws spaghetti at him.</summary>

1. * Sheldon is upset because the description of a wallet he bought online was misleading and he can't fit all of his cards in it.
* Raj's parents, who live in India, video chat with him and Leonard and express their desire for him to marry and have children soon. They set him up with Lalita Gupta, a dental student in the US.
* Raj is hesitant to go through with the arranged marriage and confides in his friends. They suggest that he should meet Lalita and see if they have a connection.

Source: The Big Bang Theory, Season 2, Episode 16, "The Cushion Saturation."

• Sheldon is drawing a hypothetical containment field for a wormhole on a napkin, which Howard dismisses as a silly doodle.
• Leonard mentions that Sheldon disappears every day at 2:45 PM, and the group decides to investigate where he goes.
• Leonard is jealous of Penny's new friend, who is a foreign exchange student with an English accent.
• Howard and Raj sneak into a storage room in the basement where Sheldon goes every day, but they cannot figure out what he does there.
• Leonard confronts Penny's friend, Cole, and finds out that he is just visiting a friend on the fourth floor.
• Sheldon is revealed to be playing keepie-uppie with a beanbag in the storage room, and he refuses to reveal what the number 43 means.

- Sheldon and Amy are recording the final episode of their flag-themed Internet show, Fun with Flags. They reminisce about past episodes and share highlights.
- Leonard, Howard, and Raj are cleaning out the office of a deceased professor and discover his food diary, which they initially mistake for research notes. They reflect on the meaning of a person's life work and make a pact to celebrate their own future achievements together.

• Caroline's mother, Liz, has passed away, and the group is making preparations for her funeral. Damon is tasked with writing her eulogy, but struggles with it due to his own past experiences.
• Meanwhile, Bonnie is still stuck in the 1994 prison world and is trying to find a way back home. She finally manages to get her magic back and plans to use the eclipse to escape. However, she finds herself in a different prison world - the Salvatore Boarding House in 1903.
• Jo, who is pregnant with Alaric's twins, is feeling unwell and discovers that Kai, who they thought they had killed, is actually still alive. Kai reveals that he accidentally took some of Jo's magic during a merge, which is causing her to be sick. He asks Jo to give him the rest of her magic so that he can survive, but Alaric steps in to protect Jo.
• Caroline is struggling to cope with her mother's death and decides to turn off her humanity switch to avoid feeling the pain. Elena confronts her about it, but Caroline ends up killing her in a fit of emotionless rage. Stefan finds Elena's unconscious body and sets out to find Caroline.

1. * Veronica and Keith discuss the manila folders they are using for their work at Mars Investigations.
2. * Mindy O'Dell, the widow of a Hearst College dean who recently committed suicide, comes to Mars Investigations to ask Keith to look into her husband's death. She believes he was murdered and wants Keith to find evidence to support her claim.
3. * At Hearst College, Mac and two students, Pauline and Gil Thomas, are missing a genetically altered capuchin monkey and twenty control-group rats that were being used for research. They suspect a group called PHAT (People for Humane Animal Treatment) is responsible.
4. * Veronica and Mac attend a PHAT meeting and learn about the group's letter-writing campaign. Veronica suspects that PHAT may be involved in the theft of the monkey and rats, and she and Mac join the group to try to find out more.
5. * Keith continues to investigate the dean's death and speaks with Weevil, who found the body. Keith doesn't believe the dean committed suicide and suspects his wife may be involved.
6. * Veronica and Mac attend a PHAT meeting and learn about the group's letter-writing campaign. Veronica suspects that PHAT may be involved in the theft of the monkey and rats, and she and Mac join the group to try to find out more.

1. * J.R. is considering accepting his father's offer of 50 million dollars in exchange for reconciliation*
2. * Babe is conflicted about her feelings for J.R. and Richie Novak*
3. * Tad advises J.R. to define his own goals and not be swayed by his father's manipulations*
4. * Colby discovers that Dre is the son of Senator Samuel Woods and is hiding from his father's political ambitions*
5. * Hannah takes Josh hostage and threatens to harm him if Zach doesn't come to her*
6. * Kendall is worried about Zach's plan to take down Hannah and asks him not to do anything crazy*

* Reese and Bianca have decided to stay in Pine Valley and raise their family there, instead of moving back to France.
* Greenlee, feeling unwell, decides to postpone her wedding to Ryan. However, on her way home, she has a severe accident when she loses control of her motorcycle and drives off a cliff.

* Dr. Sinclair informs Annie that she will be declared fit to stand trial for Richie's murder and will likely be convicted due to her taped confession.
 
 * Ryan is determined to find Greenlee, despite the storm and the sheriff's orders to stay off the water.
 
 * Kendall confronts Zach about his relationship with Reese, accusing him of helping himself to a friend when she was in a coma.
 
 * Krystal informs David of Greenlee's disappearance, but he insists that it was not an accident and that Zach is to blame.
 
 * Bianca confronts Reese about her affair with Zach, which led to Greenlee's discovery of the truth and her subsequent disappearance.

• Jake and Tad are discussing Pamela's online dating profile, which features a picture of her dog instead of herself. Jake is interested in Pamela, but Tad thinks it's a bad idea.

• Amanda and J.R. are discussing a legal agreement regarding the custody of Amanda's unborn baby. J.R. wants primary custody and is offering provisions for the baby's support.

• David and Krystal are getting married in an empty house during a power outage. David wants to say their vows in front of the fireplace, but Krystal is feeling off-kilter and wants her daughter, Jenny, and Little A present.

1. *JR Chandler is missing, and his father, Adam, is worried about him. JR has been avoiding his girlfriend, Laurie, and his best friend, Jamie, after they kissed at a party. Adam confronts Jamie about the kiss and accuses him of hiding JR.*
2. *Erica Kane's fiancé, Chris, has doubts about marrying her and confides in Jack Montgomery. Erica becomes upset when she finds out and admits to Chris that she has been cheating on him...with her work at Enchantment. Chris is relieved and the two reconcile.*
3. *Liza Colby tells Adam that she kissed Tad Martin, and Adam becomes angry and accuses her of trying to ruin their marriage. Liza and Tad have a history, and Adam is threatened by their relationship. Tad and his therapist, Lysistrata, have a flirtatious session and end up going on a date.*

1. * Krystal is in the hospital after being hit by Colby, who was trying to protect her son Little A from being taken by David.
* J.R. is in jail for trying to take Little A out of the country, and David is trying to get custody of the boy.
* Kendall is torn between her love for Zach and her feelings for Ryan, and she is currently not living with either of them.

* Erica confronts Ethan about his lies regarding Zach Slater's innocence and his false love for Kendall.
 
- Ethan insists that Kendall loves him and plans to propose to her, despite Erica's disapproval.
- Jack confides in Reggie about Lily's reluctance to identify Braden as Edmund's killer.
- Braden wants to hurt Ryan for his past mistakes and believes that Ryan deserves any harm coming to him.
- Jonathan tries to convince Braden not to hurt Ryan and to leave town instead.
- Greenlee tells Kendall about Lily's identification of Braden as Edmund's killer, but Kendall refuses to believe it.
- Greenlee and Kendall argue about Ethan's lies and Kendall's faith in him.
- Jack and the police search Greenlee's apartment for Braden and Jonathan.
- Jack tells Greenlee that Braden and Jonathan's fingerprints were found in the apartment.
- Erica threatens to ruin Ethan's plans to marry Kendall.
- Ethan vows to take down Erica if she tries to turn Kendall against him.

* Annie has been remembering more things and reveals that Tori, a friend who has been helping her remember, is present.
- Aidan is surprised to learn that Tori exists, but Annie insists that she is real.
- Adam, who is supposed to be in the hospital, shows up at Erica's place, and they share a kiss.
- Erica is concerned about Adam's safety and tells him to go back to the hospital.
- J.R., Colby, and Tad learn that Adam's car was found abandoned near a tree, and they are worried about his safety.
- Zach prays for Ian's health and asks Myrtle for help.
- Reese visits the hospital to check on Ian and gets into an argument with Kendall.
- David prepares for surgery and remembers his late daughter, Leora.
- Krystal supports David and reminds him of his strength before his surgery.

1. * Angie and Jesse spend their first night as a married couple in a hotel room, but are interrupted by a fire alarm.
* Erica, Carmen, Louisa, and Mando make a deal to participate in a reality show about the struggles of single mothers, with Erica promising them protection and anonymity.
* Greenlee decides to return to Aidan and end her search for Ryan, who encourages her to go home and be happy.

• Ryan and Annie discuss the state of their marriage, with Ryan asking for more time to figure things out and Annie agreeing to hold off on filing for divorce.
• Greenlee asks Zach for help in winning Aidan back, as she has realized that he is the one she truly loves.
• Jack and Erica discuss Carmen's legal situation, with Erica expressing her determination to help Carmen get out of prison.
• Jesse tells Tad and Colby about his friendship with Jenny, including how they met and the challenges they faced as an interracial couple in the 1980s.
• Ryan expresses his confusion and fear about the future, unsure of what he wants and wanting to avoid making any more mistakes.
• Greenlee and Zach have a heart-to-heart about her feelings for Aidan and Ryan, with Zach ultimately agreeing to help her win Aidan back.
• Erica visits Kendall in prison, with Kendall expressing her guilt over sleeping with Aidan and Erica urging her to come clean with Zach.

• Three stories of love intertwine at a wedding, including two best friends, Greenlee and Kendall, who have a dirty secret - they slept together and cheated on their significant others.
• Tad is reunited with his daughter, but the joyous occasion turns deadly when Robert, Tad's uncle, shows up and takes Angie hostage.
• Tad is shot and taken to the hospital, where Jake and Frankie work to save his life.
• Jesse and Angie fight to keep the helicopter in the air while being pursued by Robert.
• Greenlee finds out about Aidan and Kendall's betrayal and is devastated.
• Julia, a guest at the wedding, is shot and taken to the hospital. She is in critical condition and refuses surgery.
• Frankie talks Jesse out of killing Robert and instead turns him over to the police.
• Julia dies from her injuries, leaving Kathy without a mother.

• Erica Kane is being held prisoner and is pleading with her captor to let her keep photographs of her fiancé and daughter.
 • Liza Colby is informed that the DNA evidence under Diana Holden's fingernails does not match Griffin Castillo, and Tad Martin urges her to reopen the investigation and test it against Ricky Torres.
 • Kendall Hart is holding Ricky Torres at gunpoint and demanding to know where her sister Bianca Montgomery is.
 • Jane Campbell is revealed to be Erica Kane's long-lost twin sister, who blames Erica for her husband's death and is holding her captive.
 • Bianca Montgomery and Marissa Chandler have escaped from their captor and are being comforted by J.R. Chandler.

▪ Erica and Adam have a confrontation where Adam asks for Erica's help and she brings up his past wrongdoings towards her. Adam reveals that Dixie has been haunting him and has told him to give Tad back his daughter or else he will rot in hell and everyone he loves will be hurt.
▪ Ryan has remembered something about Annie, but it's not making him happy. He tells Greenlee that he and Annie were passionate, but he can't seem to feel the love he knows he had for her. Greenlee tells him that Aidan thinks she never got over him and was waiting for him to come back.
▪ Babe enlists Amanda's help in getting proof from Richie's hooker friend, Treena, because J.R. is on the warpath and Babe is afraid he will do something crazy. Jake tells Zach that he has no right digging around in his private life. Greenlee tells Kendall that husbands and wives don't tell each other everything.

• J.R. and Babe discuss the recent events, including Bess's near-kidnapping and Jamie's arrest. Babe suspects that J.R. blames her for what happened to Bess.
 • David asks Krystal to teach him how to be a good father to Babe. He wants to build a relationship with her and keep the Chandlers out of the way.
 • Krystal agrees to help David, but warns him that it will take work. David insists that he's willing to work at it.
 • Jamie confronts J.R. about drugging Babe. Jamie is worried about Babe's safety and wants to talk to J.R. before he does something stupid.
 • Reggie and Jamie are released from police custody. Jamie insists on handling the situation alone, but Tad wants to help.
 • J.R. admits to Babe that he knows Seth, the drug dealer. J.R. thinks Seth drugged Babe to get back at him.
 • Babe defends Jamie and doesn't believe that he's using drugs. J.R. hopes that he's wrong, but he's been acting strangely lately.
 • Kendall threatens Ryan, warning him that she will get what she wants, no matter what he does. Ryan warns her that if she hurts anyone he cares about, he will find a way to get her out of his life for good.

1. *Annie and Scott are planning their wedding and discussing different locations. Annie suggests the top of the Empire State Building or the club, while Scott is open to whatever she wants.*
2. *Marissa is upset after failing the bar exam and confides in Caleb. He listens and offers her support, while also defending her against J.R.'s accusations.*
3. *Ryan brings Emma to the park and Greenlee stops by with the Cinderella dress that Emma lost. Madison also meets them at the park and there is tension between her and Greenlee.*

* J.R. and Krystal discuss J.R.'s plan to buy Fusion for Babe to run, as she is scared of betraying her friends but wants the job. Krystal warns J.R. to respect Babe's choice if she says no.
* Kendall tells Greenlee about a hidden key she found in Annie's picture frame, which Annie claims was for a diary she burned. Kendall doesn't believe her and made a copy of the key, despite Ryan and Zach telling her to drop it.

* Jamie and Amanda are at a lookout point, but Babe shows up and Jamie talks to her privately.
- Tad is trying to get information from Dixie about Kevin Sturgess, who Dixie used to be married to.
- Julia is talking to Sam, who is her godson, about his family situation and how he has found a new family with the Martins.
- Ryan is taking Jonathan to the hospital, but is trying to stay out of sight because he is supposed to be dead.
- Greenlee is telling Kendall that she needs to get a divorce from Zach before they can have a baby together.
- Zach is asking Babe for information about Di Kirby, who was in prison with Babe's mother.
- Tad is trying to get Dixie to tell him anything she knows about Kevin Sturgess and his criminal activities.
- Erin is taking Jonathan to the hospital, but Ryan is waiting outside because he doesn't want to be seen.
- Greenlee and Kendall are discussing the details of the artificial insemination process, including the diet and exercise requirements.

* Damon surprises Colby with a cappuccino and chocolate croissant, trying to cheer her up after a tough night.
- A.J. asks about his grandfather's death and Marissa reassures him that David loved him very much.
- Asher's job offer at Chandler Enterprises is in jeopardy when J.R. discovers that Asher lied about attending a prestigious university.
- Greenlee and Ryan's attorney discuss the possibility of cutting a deal with the D.A. to avoid a murder charge.
- Kendall is worried about Ryan's situation and the impact it will have on Greenlee.
- Greenlee confesses to Kendall and Bianca that she was involved in David's schemes, including fixing the books and keeping Erica out of town.
- David's autopsy results reveal that he was poisoned, and Greenlee is shocked by the news.

* J.R. and Babe visit Alfred, a banker, to get information about J.R.'s missing mother, Dixie. Alfred is hesitant to give out the information, but Babe is able to persuade him by appealing to his emotions and his own relationship with his mother.
 
* Tad and Aidan are investigating Dixie's disappearance and find out that she was last seen at the yacht club where Mimi Reed's wedding was taking place. They also find a parking voucher from the yacht club near where Julia disappeared.
 
* Julia, who is being held captive by Garret, plans to poison him with bleach. She believes this will give her and her friend Di an opportunity to escape.
 
* Erin, the sister of Ryan Lavery (who was killed in a car accident), meets Greenlee for the first time. Greenlee tries to connect with Erin and explain who Ryan was as a person.
 
* Adam and Krystal have a heart-to-heart conversation. Adam apologizes for his behavior towards Krystal and tells her that he wants to be more inclusive of her in his life.
 
* Mimi, the head of a task force investigating an organized crime group, is reluctant to let Tad and Zach interview her husband Garret. Tad and Zach believe that Garret is involved in the organization and may have information about Dixie and Julia's disappearance.
 
* Julia and Di, who are being held captive by Garret, plan to attack him when he returns to their cell. They hope that this will give them a chance to escape.

1. * Bianca is upset with J.R. for lying to her about Babe saying that Bess is Miranda
* J.R. wants to protect Jamie from Adam and keep Babe from taking Bess away
* Tad is concerned about J.R.'s actions and the impact on Bianca and Jamie
2. * Greenlee tries to run over Kendall, believing she killed Ryan
* Ryan is shot at again, and Zach presents evidence that someone else is responsible
* Ethan's charges are dismissed, and he is free
3. * Greenlee believes she has a brain tumor and is going to die
* Ryan and Greenlee go to the hospital to figure out what's going on
* Maria realizes that Zach was the other shooter.

1. * Frankie and Randi attend a fundraiser, but Frankie is uncomfortable with his father's new family*
2. * Rebecca, Frankie's new stepsister, is nervous about meeting the family*
3. * Jake and Taylor attend the fundraiser, and Jake tries to get Taylor to open up about her past*
4. * Amanda and David discuss their plan to take down J.R.*
5. * Erica and Bianca host the fundraiser and discuss the future of Fusion*
6. * Zach receives bad news about his wife's condition and becomes angry with the doctor*
7. * Annie calls Ryan and tells him she wants to meet at the fundraiser, implying that she will harm Erica*
8. * Annie shows up at the fundraiser with a knife and stabs Erica, intending to ruin her wedding to Ryan.*

• Erica and Jack discuss their marriage and the challenges they are facing, including the actions of Dr. Greg Madden. Erica asks Jack not to blame Kendall for what has happened.
• Ryan and Kendall argue over Kendall's decision to keep Greenlee's pregnancy a secret. Ryan is angry with Kendall for interfering in his relationship with Greenlee.
• Erin and Aidan have a conversation while Erin is out for a run. They discuss their pasts and Erin's devotion to her brother, Jonathan. Aidan suggests that Erin should have plans and goals of her own, but Erin insists that taking care of Jonathan is her top priority.

• Emily is accused of setting up Will by planting a doll at Fairwinds and pretending it was him. She denies it and volunteers to take a polygraph test.

 • Lucy and Rafael are trapped in a mine and are running out of oxygen. Dusty finds them and helps them escape, but not before being confronted by Dominic Ramsey, who is responsible for their predicament.

* Gwen and Will introduce their new baby, Hallie Jennifer Munson, to Casey.
- Casey feels guilty for not being there for Gwen and the baby when they needed him in the past.
- Brad asks Katie to help him with his crutches, and Katie encourages him to start moving and becoming more independent.
- Dr. Seidman talks to Parker and his parents about his anger issues and fear of abandonment, suggesting family therapy as a solution.
- Carly goes to the hospital to see her sister, Rosanna, but finds that she has already been taken to Switzerland for treatment.
- Casey visits his grandmother, Lisa, who offers him a job at Crash.
- Sam tells Carly that she needs to forgive herself for not being there for Rosanna, and Carly invites Sam to stay with her at her place.
- Brad plans to tell Katie that he loves her, but she becomes uncomfortable and leaves before he can.
- Lisa hires Casey to work at Crash and is understanding about his past mistakes.
- Jack tells Katie that he is going to therapy to face his own problems and apologizes for hurting her in the past.

1. Casey Hughes is getting married to Alison Stewart the next day and is feeling nervous but excited.
2. Mick Dante, a patient at the hospital, has escaped and Alison Stewart is missing, causing concern for her family.
3. It is revealed that Alison had slept with Mick Dante, which her family is struggling to understand.
4. Paul suspects that Mick Dante is being controlled by the spirit of his dead father, James Stenbeck.
5. Barbara, Paul's mother, believes that Mick Dante is actually James Stenbeck, who has discovered a way to reverse the aging process.
6. Mick Dante is holding Alison captive and trying to convince her to run away with him.
7. Alison is trying to help Mick Dante, who she believes is being controlled and needs professional help.
8. Paul is determined to find Mick Dante and kill him, believing that he is a danger to his family.
9. Emily is able to stop Paul from leaving the house with a gun and convinces him to reject his father's plans and stand united with her.

1. Casey and Maddie briefly interact at the Thanksgiving parade, where Maddie is carrying a surprise for her Valentine's Day date, Nate.
2. Mike and Katie share a romantic moment while blindfolded, and Jack calls Carly to tell her he won't be home for dinner due to work.
3. Holden and Lily are surprised with the news that they are expecting another baby, while Dusty and Jennifer discuss their relationship and Paul's potential survival.
4. Meg returns to town after receiving a cryptic message, believing Paul to be in trouble, but Paul denies calling her and tells her to leave.
5. Jennifer expresses her hope that Paul is still alive to Dusty, who is skeptical and concerned about giving her false hope.
6. Carly surprises Jack at work with a seductive outfit, and Holden expresses his concerns about Jade, the possible daughter of the late Rose D'Angelo.
7. Paul and Meg discuss his plan to come back from the dead for Jennifer, while Dusty reassures Jennifer of his commitment to their relationship.
8. Will and Gwen enjoy a romantic moment while playing with a guitar, and Casey suspects they are hiding something.
9. Paul and Meg reflect on their lives and decide to stick together, while Jennifer and Dusty solidify their relationship and Jennifer promises to let go of her hope for Paul's survival.

1. * Casey, Emily, Barbara, Alison, and Paul are being held hostage by Mick, who is pretending to be James Stenbeck. Mick forces them to play "truth or dare" and reveals embarrassing secrets about Emily and Alison.
2. * Margo is outside the church, coordinating the police response. She is worried about her son Casey and wants to find a way to rescue the hostages without endangering their lives.
3. * Tom suggests that Margo should wait for Dante to call her, as James Stenbeck would do. Margo agrees and prays that Dante will call her in the next 10 minutes.

1. Mike books a table at the Lakeview to celebrate Jennifer's relaunch of Street Jeans, but Jennifer is feeling down about missing most of the press conference and her mother being present.

1. * Melanie is upset because her father is leaving town to take some time for himself due to his hand tremor

• The characters Belle and Shawn discuss the possibility of telling Philip the truth about their feelings for each other before he goes to war. They consider sending an email as the only option left, but Belle is hesitant as it seems harsh.

• Mimi confesses to Rex that she had an abortion months ago and didn't know what to do. She thought she was doing the right thing, but has regretted it every second. Rex forgives her and understands why she lied to him.

• Kate and Eugenia plot against Sami, with Kate saying that a man from Sami's past will destroy her happiness and Eugenia adding that Sami will never walk down the aisle. They plan to make sure that Sami's wedding day horoscope comes true.

• Brady and Jennifer run into each other and Brady tells Jennifer about his decision to leave rehab and his missed opportunity to see Arianna's christening.

• Carly is buried alive by Vivian, who is seeking revenge for Lawrence's death.
 • Vivian has kidnapped Melanie and plans to harm her during her wedding ceremony.

1. Max is overwhelmed with work and personal issues, including helping his girlfriend Mimi deal with her father's criminal activities and the aftermath of a car crash. He confides in his friend Abby, who encourages him to start racing again. Max reveals that he had a crush on Abby in the past, and they share a moment.
2. Chelsea, another character, is dealing with the fallout of her own actions, including being kicked out of her father's house after he accuses her of helping a criminal. She seeks comfort from her mother Billie and her friend Nick, but is still feeling lost and unloved.
3. Meanwhile, Bo and Hope are discussing Chelsea's situation and Bo's decision to cut her off from the family. Hope believes that Chelsea deserves another chance and tries to convince Bo to forgive her.
4. Other subplots include Dr. Rebert offering Nick a job and Steve expressing his love for Kayla.

▪ Abe is frustrated with his recovery from surgery and his poor night vision. He thinks he saw Lexie with someone, but she brushes it off as a shadow.

▪ Marlena is still worried about John's threats and tells him that she chose Alex, not him. Alex suggests that John might be stalking them.

▪ Mimi feels guilty about keeping the secret of Claire's paternity and decides to tell Shawn the truth. Meanwhile, Philip and Belle are happy with their baby and want Mimi and Shawn to be happy as well.

▪ Lexie and Tek are having an affair, and Lexie feels guilty about breaking her marriage vows. She tells Tek that it needs to end, but he disagrees.

▪ Alex is planning his revenge against John and wants to take Marlena away from him. John surprises Marlena by showing up at her door, and she tells him that she still loves him.
• The text describes several different conversations between various characters, including Marlena and John, Rex and Rolf, Shawn-D and Belle, and Kate and Roman.

1. Chelsea, a patient of Dr. Jonas, has passed out and is being treated in the hospital. Her grandmother, Kate, suspects that there is more to her condition than what Dr. Jonas is letting on. Chelsea's test results reveal that her condition is not good.
2. Ava, a mentally unstable woman, is holding Hope, Bo, and Steve captive. She has revealed to Kayla that she plans to use Kayla as a surrogate and take the baby for herself. She also threatens to decide who lives and who dies once the baby is born.

• EJ DiMera plans to divorce his wife Nicole for Taylor, who he claims to be in love with.
• Nicole suspects that EJ and Stefano have been keeping Rafe captive in their basement and wants to prove it with a DNA report.

• Rafe is revealed to be an imposter, and Bo asks him to come to the station to give an official statement about finding Theo and Ciara.
• Taylor is conflicted about her feelings for EJ, who assures her that he will be gentle and kind with Nicole after the divorce.

• Jack is reunited with his family and they celebrate Abby's 17th birthday.

• Belle and Mimi discuss their current situations, both expressing their fears and concerns.

• Bo and Billie investigate a lead in the search for Georgia, but find the place deserted.

• Marlena and Roman are reunited, as well as John and Kate.
• Roman and Kate discuss the unbelievable circumstances of their return.

1. Nick Fallon and Max have a falling out over a grant proposal that Max significantly changed without Nick's knowledge or approval. Nick decides to return the grant money and confronts Max about his actions.

• JJ has been shot and is at the hospital. Marlena, a psychiatrist, is trying to help him breathe better by relieving pressure on his collapsed lung.
• Orpheus, a criminal, has taken John hostage and planted a bomb at the pub. Steve, John's friend, has gone to look for John despite the danger.

• Marlena is able to relieve the pressure on JJ's lung, but he is still in critical condition. Chad and Gabi are waiting for an ambulance to take him to the hospital.

• Anne has convinced Lucas to let her stay at the house. She is trying to manipulate him into feeling sorry for her and giving her a job at the hospital.
• Justin is worried about Adrienne and goes to the hospital to check on her. He and Adrienne have a history and he still has feelings for her.
• Jennifer, JJ's mother, is at the hospital and is praying for her son to recover. She is worried about losing him and being alone.
• Orpheus tries to kill Marlena with a sedative, but John is able to stop him. Orpheus is killed in the struggle.

• Sheila apologizes to Abe for calling in sick without notice, but Abe is still upset that she didn't inform him about her illness.

 • Abe apologizes to Sheila for doubting her and allows her to keep her job.

 • Will tells Marlena that Sonny has left town and he is unable to locate him.
 • Paul tells John that he has decided to move back to San Francisco to participate in an experimental program that could help him walk again.
 • Claire tells Ben that she thinks he did the right thing by exposing Tripp's actions. She asks him not to tell the police about Tripp.

• Claire and Ciara suspect that Valerie, who is having dinner with Abe, is up to something and plan to investigate her. Shawn advises Claire to stay out of Abe's personal life.

 • Chad tells Sonny about his feelings for Gabi, but Sonny encourages him to support Gabi and JJ's relationship. Sonny reveals that he and Paul are now just friends, as Paul is seeing someone else. Gabi and JJ make plans to spend Thanksgiving together with their sons. Abigail contemplates reuniting with her family.

• Rafe informs Sami that he may be reinstated in the FBI, which would give him direct access to files that could help find Sydney.
• Melanie tells Stephanie that she and Philip are eloping to Las Vegas to get married that night.
• Victor and Vivian are driving to Chicago for New Year's Eve, but Hope and Justin plan to search Vivian's room for documents related to Carly's secret.

1. Luke Spencer is in the hospital and is visited by his wife, Tracy Quartermaine. She is concerned about his health and wants him to take better care of himself. Luke reassures her that he still has a lot of miles left in his "old ticker."
2. Alexis Davis is nominated for "Litigator of the Year" and is trying to find the perfect dress for the awards dinner. She wishes Kate Howard were there to help her, as she is currently in Manhattan.
3. Sonny Corinthos has been arrested in New York City for simple assault. Jason Morgan and Carly Corinthos are trying to find out where he is being held, but are having difficulty due to the primitive software of the municipality's database.

• Sonny and Olivia's son, Dante, has been shot and is in critical condition at the hospital. Sonny and Olivia have just found out that they are Dante's parents.

 • Dante is a police officer who has been working undercover to take down Sonny's organization. Sonny is unaware of Dante's true identity and has shot him in self-defense.

 • Olivia is at the hospital with Dante, and Sonny has called in Robin and Patrick to help with his care. Dante is in emergency surgery and his chances of survival are uncertain.

 • Sonny is struggling with the fact that he has shot his own son and is seeking forgiveness from a higher power. He is also beginning to see the similarities between himself and Dante and is expressing regret for the life he has chosen to live.

• Claudia is at Sonny's office to discuss a business deal with Jason.

• Johnny is missing, and Claudia suspects that Sonny has something to do with it.
• Diego has kidnapped Sam and is holding her captive.
• Nikolas and Emily are discussing the night Emily was killed.
• Epiphany is being encouraged to join a heart-health awareness group.
• Jason is trying to negotiate a truce between Sonny and Claudia's families.
• Spinelli and Maxie are trying to decipher a clue left behind by Cooper.

• Lucky catches Johnny wearing a Clinton mask and trying to break into Bernie Abrams' office.
• Johnny denies breaking into Bernie's office and Lucky cannot prove it, so no report can be filed.
• Lucky asks Jason to stall in retaliating against Johnny to prevent a mob war.
• Diane is remodeling her office, so Alexis will be sharing the space with her until the renovations are complete.
• Nikolas wants to set up a trust for Elizabeth's unborn baby, but she is hesitant to accept his help.
• Michael is frustrated with being under house arrest and wants to leave the mansion.
• Michael feels guilty for Claudia's death and believes it is his fault that his father may go to prison.
• Dante and Claire discuss the evidence against Sonny and the possibility of Michael testifying.
• Diane convinces Alexis to bill Nikolas for legal advice given to Michael.
• Elizabeth decides to raise her children on her own, regardless of who the father of her unborn baby is.

• Todd Manning is held at gunpoint by his daughter, Starr, after she discovers he killed her boyfriend and daughter.
• Maxie Jones is grieving the loss of her best friend, Robin Scorpio Drake, and feels guilty about not being able to save her.
• Johnny Zacchara and Kate Howard discuss Johnny's plan to plant evidence against Sonny Corinthos.
• Tracy Quartermaine and Anthony Zacchara argue about Sonny's involvement in a fatal car accident caused by Anthony.

1. Sonny and Carly visit Jason, Sam, and their new baby in the hospital. Sonny and Carly discuss Morgan's death and the fact that Olivia Jerome, the person responsible for the bomb that killed him, is still at large. Carly wants to find Olivia and make her pay.
2. Julian is held captive by Olivia Jerome, who forces him to point a gun at Alexis and shoot her. Julian refuses and tries to protect Alexis, but Olivia shoots her anyway. The scene ends with the sound of a gunshot.

1. * Michael is angry that Brandon, who attempted to rape Abby, is out on bail. He feels that the legal system has failed him and Abby.
2. * Luke is blaming himself for the death of Jake, the son of Lucky Spencer, who was hit by Luke's car. Sonny is trying to console him and make him see that it was an accident.
3. * Jason is grieving the loss of his son Jake, who was raised by Lucky Spencer. He is having a hard time accepting that Luke hitting Jake was an accident and not caused by Luke's drinking.

1. * Carly and Jax are in a custody battle for their daughter Josslyn, with Jax using a preliminary report to try to get full emergency custody. Carly is worried about Franco being a threat to Josslyn and hires Shawn as a guard, but Jax fires him and replaces him with his own security team.
2. * Sam and Jason discuss the possibility of having a baby together. Sam wants to have a family, but Jason is hesitant due to his past experiences with losing children. Sam also struggles with the loss of her own child and the pain of not being able to tell her how much she loves her.

1. * Jason and Sam suspect that Nikolas faked his own death and staged a murder scene to cover his tracks. They believe that Nikolas was trying to escape from someone, possibly Hayden, and used a secret passageway to make his escape.
2. * Nathan confesses to Maxie that he shot Claudette's lover in a drunken rage years ago. Nathan was a cop in New York at the time and was off-duty when the incident occurred. He has been searching for the man ever since, but has not been able to find any trace of him.
3. * Hayden's mother, Naomi, shows up unexpectedly and reveals that she has been trying to track down her diamond necklace, which was sold by Nikolas. Hayden tells her that Nikolas found the diamonds hidden away and stole them, but Naomi does not believe her and accuses her of lying.

* Nikolas ends his relationship with Rebecca because he sees Emily when he looks at her.

- Claudia asks her uncle Rudy to ensure that her involvement in Michael's shooting cannot be traced back to her.
  
- Andrea, the mayor's wife, wants Patrick to settle a malpractice suit out of court to protect her husband's reputation.
  
- Elizabeth suspects Rebecca is cheating on Nikolas with Ethan and asks Lucky to investigate.
  
- Monica encourages Nikolas not to use Emily's memory as an excuse to shut out the world.
  
- Olivia seeks Carly's help in dealing with Sonny's disapproval of her relationship with Johnny.
  
- Claudia asks Johnny to help her get rid of Jason, who is a threat to her and her unborn baby.

• Georgie regains consciousness and is able to see Maxie before she dies. Maxie dies shortly after saying goodbye to her sister and other loved ones.
• Nikolas and Emily reconcile and make love, with Nikolas vowing to help Emily heal from her rape.

• Tracy insists on going with Luke to find Jerry Jacks, who has the cure for Luke's polonium 210 poisoning. Luke initially refuses, but Tracy argues that she wants to help him and that she has a personal stake in this matter as she had to lie to her father on his deathbed and owes Jerry Jacks $18 million.

• Lulu tells Nikolas and Laura that Stavros forced her to marry him and that he wanted her to consummate the marriage. When she refused, he had Nikolas shot to punish her. Nikolas is grateful that Lulu didn't give in to Stavros' demands and tells her that he is not angry with her.

• Shawn tells Alexis that he did not shoot Olivia and that he is an innocent man. Alexis is relieved that he is not responsible for the shooting, but she is still uncomfortable with the fact that he kills people for a living. Shawn asks her if she would end their relationship over his job, and Alexis says yes.

• Ava and Franco convince Carly to let Morgan stay with them by telling her how happy Kiki makes him. Ava also tells Carly that if she truly loves Morgan, she will let the two of them be together. Franco and Ava then tell Morgan and Kiki that they have convinced Carly to let him stay.

• Ms. Gilbert, a patient with AIDS, is stable after a procedure where Dr. Drake accidentally pricked himself and was exposed to her blood.
• Dr. Drake is advised to get tested for HIV and Hepatitis B and C, and to start post-exposure prophylaxes (PEP) as a precaution.
• Nikolas thanks Alfred for trying to set him up with his ex-wife Emily, but declines as it wouldn't be fair to Emily.
• Nikolas' son, John, is mentioned to need a mother, implying that Nikolas is feeling a lack in his life.
• Sonny is angry with his therapist, Dr. Winters, for suggesting that his mother is to blame for the abuse he suffered as a child.
• Emily stands up to Sonny and tells him that he needs to take responsibility for his actions and not blame his mother.
• Lucky struggles with the fact that he did not actually kill Manny, the criminal he was credited for shooting, and Jason was the one who threw Manny off the roof.
• Sam is studying for her G.E.D. test and Jason offers to help her.

• Sam McCall leaves a message for Dr. Finn to call her back about test results that will affect her decisions.
• Kevin is recovering from being shot and is getting test results for malaria.
• Laura saved Kevin's life by cutting a bullet out of his shoulder.
• Ava Jerome's brother, Julian, has been arrested and is being held in jail.
• Kristina and Aaron are having issues in their relationship due to Kristina's feelings for her professor, Parker.
• Alexis Davis is trying to get Julian to sign divorce papers, but he is not ready to give up on their marriage.
• Ava is the new head of the Jerome family, but she is trying to distance herself from the business to take care of her daughters.
• Julian is asking Ava to help him escape from prison.
• Sam finds out she is pregnant and is worried about passing malaria to her unborn child.
• Elizabeth Webber supports Sam and offers to go with her to get her test results.

* Starr reassures Michael that he will do great at his wedding, suggesting he speak to his father directly instead of using a microphone.
 * Olivia confronts Connie and Steve about Kate's behavior, presenting a handkerchief as evidence that Connie has taken over Kate's personality again.
 * Dante and Steve urge Olivia to take it easy, suspecting she may be experiencing a relapse of her past mental health issues.
 * Alexis informs Sonny that Kristina will not be attending the wedding due to a fight with her husband, Trey.
 * Carly and Johnny discuss their concerns about Kate's insistence that Johnny attend the wedding.

 * Connie ultimately stops the wedding, revealing that she is already married to Joe Jr., Sonny's enemy.

* Johnny and Claudia discuss Claudia's upcoming marriage to Sonny Corinthos. Claudia reveals that she is going through with the marriage to strengthen Johnny's position in the organization and ensure that he will have a powerful empire to run when he takes over. Johnny expresses his discomfort with the arrangement, stating that he doesn't want power if it's at the cost of selling out his sister.
* Jason and Spinelli discuss the ongoing conflict with the Russian mob. Spinelli reveals that he went against Jason's orders and confronted the Russians at gunpoint, but was unable to pull the trigger. Jason advises Spinelli to stay true to himself and not try to be a hero, as that is who Maxie needs him to be. Olivia interrupts to suggest that Jason make peace with Sonny and let him back into the mob to prevent him from becoming too aligned with the Zaccharas.

1. Todd Manning is in the hospital after being attacked by Cole Thornhart, who believes that Todd is responsible for the death of his mother, Marty Saybrooke's, baby. Todd tries to convince Dani that he is innocent and that he only wants a chance to be her father.
2. Jessica is getting ready for her senior prom and asks her father, Clint, for his opinion on her dress. Clint approves of her wearing a different dress than the one her grandfather had bought for her. Reed Wagner, a business associate of Clint's, stops by and meets Jessica.
3. Blair discovers Téa in her office, where she has knocked over some items in a fit of anger. Téa admits that she is upset about Todd's situation and is trying to help him to protect her daughter, Dani. Blair is shocked when she receives a phone call with the news that Téa is dying.

 • Clint and Dorian are at Dorian's apartment when Blair arrives to tell them about the terrible news regarding Jessica's health.

- Whitney is hesitant at first, but eventually accepts the offer, despite knowing her mother will be against it.
- Meanwhile, Miguel and Kay discuss their situation and consider options for paying for college and taking care of Maria.
- Theresa calls Child Protective Services after witnessing Rebecca mistreating Little Ethan via an internet hookup.

• T.C. and Eve's conversation is interrupted by Liz, who is upset about her past being revealed. T.C. comforts Liz and tells her that he will always be there for her.

• Tom Joyner, a whistleblower from Crane Industries, confronts Julian and Rebecca about stealing from their own workers and robbing them of their pension and retirement fund. Tom wants Julian dead, but Rebecca tries to talk him out of it.

- Gwen and Theresa are in a heated argument over Jane, with Gwen threatening to kill Theresa. Ethan is torn between choosing Gwen or Theresa as his future. Luis and Sheridan are determined to do a DNA test on Marty to prove he is Sheridan's son.

1. Whitney and Chad's trip to LA: Whitney is confused about why her mother, who was previously against her going to LA with Chad, has now changed her mind. T.C., Whitney's father, is also against this decision and is having a fight with Eve about it. Julian tries to comfort Eve and tells her that she did the right thing in encouraging Whitney to go to LA with Chad to protect her from Liz.
2. Sheridan's disappearance: The search for Sheridan has been officially called off, and Antonio believes that she is probably at a spa in Paris. However, Luis is not convinced and wants to continue the search. Beth is happy that the search has been called off and is confident that her plan to win Luis back will work now that Sheridan is out of the way.
3. Tabitha's pregnancy: Tabitha is pregnant, and Ivy is suspicious about who the father is. Tabitha is worried that Charity might have touched something in her room and is afraid of the consequences. Charity has a vision of Tabitha's baby and realizes that it is a demon child. Tabitha tries to prevent Charity from telling anyone about it.

▪ Fancy and Chris are discussing a video of Fancy and Luis that upset Sheridan.
▪ Gwen, Ethan, Jared, and Theresa are at a hotel and hear lovemaking sounds coming from outside their rooms.
▪ Miguel and Kay end up in a mysterious romantic location together after Miguel expresses his desire to spend time alone with Kay.

• Fox is hiding a secret from Kay - he has a serious medical condition and may not have long to live.
• Rebecca, Gwen's mother, is pretending to be Gwen in order to keep Ethan, Gwen's husband, from finding out that Gwen is not there.
• Gwen and Theresa are in a competition to win J.T.'s services, who can provide them with information about Ethan.
• Luis, Fancy's boyfriend, is searching for her after she went missing. Chris is suspected of being involved in her disappearance.
• Fox is trying to hide his medical condition from Kay and wants to make sure she is happy before he tells her the truth.
• There is tension between Gwen and Theresa as they both want to be with Ethan and are willing to go to great lengths to make that happen.

* Victor Newman and his daughters, Victoria and Abby, are in a legal battle over the ownership of Newman Enterprises.
 
 * Victor's company is being audited by forensic accountants to determine the value of Victoria and Abby's trusts.
 
 * Victoria and Abby's lawyer, Vance Abrams, is trying to freeze one-third of Newman Enterprises' assets due to Victor's plan to sell a major holding in Dubai, which would devalue the company.
 
 * Victor denies these claims and states that the sale of the Dubai holding has always been the plan.
 
 * Michael Baldwin, Victor's lawyer, argues that there is no evidence of wrongdoing in the accountants' report.
 
 * Heather Stevens is subpoenaed to testify in a drug-related case and is worried about a secret witness.
 
 * Paul Williams offers to help Heather find out who the secret witness is.
 
 * Jack Abbott is in Hawaii looking for evidence that Victor set up his son, Adam, for Skye Lockhart's murder.
 
 * Jack finds a burned-down shack where Skye was living and a bottle of her rare perfume in the ashes.
 
 * The judge orders one-third of Newman Enterprises' assets to be frozen in escrow until the lawsuit is resolved.

- The family will be contacted to make arrangements once the medical examiner releases the body.

1. Genevieve is getting married to Jack and will be meeting him in Las Vegas. She mentions to Victor that she has been running around doing errands and just got her nails done. Victor offers his "heartfelt congratulations" but sounds insincere.
2. Chelsea is talking to Adam about how she was offered money to seduce Billy and slip something in his drink. She says things went too far and people got hurt, but she is making sure her baby has a real home with two parents who love him. Adam tells her she put her baby first and that's something to be proud of.
