• Lauren and Michael celebrate after Avery successfully negotiates a plea deal for Lauren.
• Daisy tells Lauren that she wants her to help her register for her wedding at Fenmore's.
• Daniel and Daisy elope, while Paul warns Avery about Ricky's character.

- Daniel has been arrested for his involvement in a car accident that left Cassie, Nick and Sharon's daughter, in critical condition. Lily, who was also at the party, has been visiting Cassie in the hospital and trying to help Daniel, who is feeling guilty and considering leaving town.
- Michael has been trying to improve his relationship with his mother, Gloria, who is worried about John's stress levels and the negative influence of the new tenants in the Abbott house, including Daniel and Phyllis. Michael is also trying to plan a special evening for Lauren, who is upset with him for not communicating with her.

• Sharon and Nick discuss their feelings around the anniversary of Cassie's death, with Sharon mentioning that she has been feeling a "strange, cloudy, sort of numb feeling" and Nick mentioning that he dreads May because of the good weather reminding him of Cassie.
 • Phyllis walks in on Summer and Fenmore in a physical altercation, with Fenmore on top of Summer and Kyle standing nearby. Phyllis calls everyone's parents and sends them away in a limo.
 • Michael and Lauren argue about Lauren's relationship with Carmine, with Michael mentioning that he sees Lauren with Carmine whenever he looks at her.
 • Abby confronts Carmine about who he got into a physical altercation with, and Carmine reveals that it was a "jealous husband" but refuses to give more details.
 • Jack leaves a voicemail for Phyllis asking her to have coffee with him and work things out, while Phyllis tries to mediate the situation between Nick, Summer, and Kyle.
 • Dr. Watkins and Sharon discuss Sharon's feelings of loneliness and her desire to be in love, with Dr. Watkins encouraging Sharon to find a purpose outside of romantic relationships.

• Chelsea and Chloe's therapist have not heard from Chloe, who missed a therapy appointment and violated her probation.
• Michael, an officer of the court, may have to report Chloe's violation to Paul, but Kevin asks him to give him more time to find Chloe and take her to Fairview himself.
• Nikki tells Ian that they were never friends and that he took advantage of her. Ian claims that the case against him was dismissed and that he is willing to forgive Nikki for trying to send him to prison.
• Victor tells Ian to stay away from his family and Ian responds that he can approach anyone he likes now that he is a free man.
• Dylan tells Ian that he knows he is guilty of extortion and that he will not let him get away with what he did to Nikki.
• Lauren asks Michael to have faith in his brother Kevin, who is trying to help Chloe despite her past behavior towards him.
• Kevin tells Chloe that he still cares about her and wants to help her, even though she has been mean and out of control towards him.

1. Nick is struggling with guilt over the death of his daughter, Cassie, and blames himself for not keeping her home the night she died in a car accident. He also regrets his past actions towards his wife, Sharon, and feels responsible for the distance that has grown between them.
2. Cassie appears to Nick as a ghost and shows him how different things could have been if he had made different choices. She encourages him to stop dwelling on "what ifs" and to figure out what he truly wants in life.
3. Nick decides to move back home and be with his family, including his son, Noah. He knocks on the door of his old home and tells Sharon that he needs to be with her.

• Michael and Lauren discuss their busy day and the Newman Enterprises IPO.
- Phyllis interrupts to discuss Daisy's court hearing and asks for forgiveness.
- Daisy and Leslie discuss Daisy's court appearance and her desire for what's best for her daughter.
- Daniel and Victoria discuss taking care of Lucy, while Billy expresses frustration with the amount of formula they have.
- Gloria and Jeff discuss tasks at the Gloworm and meet Genevieve, who is throwing herself a party.
- Diane tells Nick that she truly loved him before marrying his father and wants another chance.
- Michael informs Victor that Newman Enterprises stock is expected to open in the $50 to $60 range and could go as high as $80 or $90 a share.
- Adam and Diane discuss their plan to make a fortune off of Victor's IPO and Diane's inside information.

1. Devon paid off Elena's student loans without her knowledge, causing her to feel disrespected and demand space to re-evaluate their relationship. Mariah and Nate later help Devon understand why Elena was upset and encourage him to talk to her.
2. Kevin reveals to Michael that Chloe faked her death and they have been living in Portland for the past two years. However, they had to leave after Kevin learned that Adam was alive. Kevin came to Genoa City to get Chloe back from Adam, who has been holding her captive.

1. Kevin announces his plans to move to Portland, Oregon with his daughter Bella for a fresh start.
2. Michael and Esther express their concerns about the move, but Kevin insists it's the best decision for him and Bella.
3. Sharon is offered a job back at Chelsea 2.0 by Chelsea, who wants her to help take her brand to the next level.
4. Victor and Nick have a heated argument about Nikki's upcoming benefit concert, with Nick believing his mother is not interested in performing.
5. Nikki reveals to Victor that she had a flare-up of her MS before leaving town, but she has been taking holistic treatments to manage the pain.
6. Scott expresses his frustration with Nick's lack of involvement in the concert preparations, while Sharon defends Nick's actions.
7. Tessa tells Mariah that she told Nick about Nikki's flare-up, causing Mariah to worry about the consequences of her actions.

1. * Sharon is dealing with the uncertainty of her husband Nicholas' paternity of a child and is feeling like her life is out of her control. Jack encourages her to take control of her life back.
2. * Colleen is receiving threatening notes and phone calls that she believes are related to her father, Brad Carlton. She has been lying to him about the investigation into his past.
3. * Kevin has obtained $10,000 to pay off Alex, who is threatening to reveal a tape of Kevin and Daniel committing a crime unless they pay him. However, Alex reveals that he has made a copy of the tape.

1. * Billy plans to fire his editor-in-chief and hopes his sister Phyllis understands his position
2. * Ashley offers Victoria a job at Jabot, but Jack has already approached her about a job at Beauty of Nature
3. * Jack and Nikki plan their wedding while tasting menu options for the reception
4. * Adam and Chelsea share a romantic moment while eating doughnuts, but Chelsea is afraid of mice
5. * Phyllis is fired from "Restless Style" after her arrest and plans to write an article about her perspective on the situation.

• Mariah wants to be with Tessa, who needs to leave town to find her sister Crystal.
• Hilary and Devon are getting married in the ICU before she gets out of the hospital.
• Hilary knows that her condition has worsened and wants to enjoy her wedding day without regrets.
• Devon is unaware of Hilary's worsening condition and wants to marry her to make her happy.
• Mariah is leaving Genoa City to be with Tessa, and she will not tell anyone the real reason for her departure.
• Lily is devastated for Devon and Hilary and decides to skip the wedding.
• Hilary passes out, and Mariah informs Devon.
• Devon and Hilary get married in the ICU, surrounded by their loved ones.

1. * John Abbott, a family patriarch, has been taken to the hospital after experiencing vision problems and a possible stroke while in prison. His family, including his wife Gloria, children Ashley and Jack, and grandson Kevin, gather at the hospital to await news of his condition.
2. * Meanwhile, Lily, the daughter of Neil and Drucilla, has returned home after discovering that her husband Daniel has been lying to her about his past relationship with another woman. Lily is upset and unsure of where to turn, as her parents are also dealing with their own issues and struggling to connect with their daughter.
3. * As the Abbott family waits for updates on John's condition, tensions rise and old wounds are reopened. Gloria is worried about her husband and frustrated with the hospital staff, while Ashley and Jack argue over how to handle the situation. Kevin tries to keep the peace, but is also dealing with his own concerns about his mother's well-being.

1. Megan reads aloud an article about Jack Abbott, calling him a "backstabbing snake" who double-crossed his partners to get revenge on Victor Newman. Jack suggests the title for his next article about Victor would be "The man with a black hole for a heart."
2. Sharon and Jack discuss the recent issues of "Restless Style" and the negative impact it has had on their relationships with Nick and Phyllis. Jack defends his actions by saying it will increase sales, but Sharon is concerned about the harm it will cause.
3. Cane and Chloe announce to Jill that they got married and she was not invited. Jill is upset but agrees to turn their planned engagement party into a wedding reception.
4. Adam offers Brad a position as C.E.O. of Newman Enterprises, citing their similar aggressive business approaches. Brad accepts.
5. Victoria, J.T., Paul, and Heather discuss the search for Victor and Nikki in Mexico. Paul offers to go and Nick agrees to let him.
6. Jill confronts Jack about an article in "Restless Style" that accuses her of knowing about David Chow's gambling problem and using it to appoint her son as C.E.O. She threatens to sue him.

* Murphy, Jill, Lily, Cane, Kevin, Billy, Victoria, and others have gathered to honor the late Katherine Chancellor.
 
  * Katherine left instructions from beyond the grave, and Murphy is there to deliver them.
 
  * Victoria is supposed to be at her son Johnny's preschool orientation but is stuck at the hospital due to bureaucracy. Billy helps her "escape" so she can make it to the orientation.
 
  * Neil has lost his sight due to an electrical accident and is struggling with being treated like a victim.
 
  * Katherine's instructions involve writing letters to her and placing them in a bowl to be burned, with the smoke delivering the words to her.
 
  * The group participates in the ritual, writing down their thoughts, hopes, dreams, and troubles.
 
  * Katherine's letter to each person is read aloud, offering advice, comfort, and love.
 
  * Victor and Nikki share a dance, and Victor takes Nikki home, where she meets with a doctor.
 
  * Jill has a private moment with Katherine's music box and realizes that the journey was the treasure, not the destination. She thanks Katherine for the magic and returns the music box.
 
  * The group continues the party at Jill's house.

- Jill has been cleared of any wrongdoing in the S.E.C. investigation and plans to take back control of Chancellor Industries with Cane's help.
- Michael agrees to take in River's daughter, Eden, in order to help her father's case. However, Eden is resistant and wants to find a place to stay on her own.

1. Jack resigns from the Abbott-Winters Foundation due to his loss of faith in the cause and his anger towards his brother Billy, who he believes is an incurable addict and a lost cause.
2. Billy and Jack argue over their roles in the breakdown of Jack's marriage to Phyllis, with Billy accusing Jack of being self-righteous and hypocritical.
3. Nikki tries to convince Phyllis not to give up on Jack and to take the high road with Victor, while Victoria is upset about Travis moving out and Billy's relationship with Phyllis.
4. Neil tries to talk sense into both Jack and Billy, urging them to work through their issues and not let their anger consume them.

• A medical team is trying to resuscitate a patient, Damon, who is exsanguinating and in ventricular fibrillation.
 • Damon sees his deceased son, Elias, who tells him that it's not his time to go and that he should let go of his hate and anger.
 • Kevin is trying to help Lily deal with her trauma after being trapped in an elevator with a man who was grabbing at her.
 • Michael and Kevin are having issues because Kevin is angry about Michael being involved with Lauren.
 • Nick is trying to find a way to get Sharon hired at Jabot, so he offers to cover her salary personally.
 • Ashley and Brad are discussing their relationship, which has ended due to Ashley's feelings for Victor.
 • Nikki is upset with Victor for spending time with Ashley, who has expressed her desire to leave her husband for him.
 • Dru is upset about the death of Damon, who was a peaceful man but died a violent death.

�bullet	Chance is being honored for his bravery and awarded a commendation for service above and beyond the line of duty.
�bullet	Heather, the prosecutor, missed the ceremony because she had to get back to a hearing. She tells Chance that she has some questions for him regarding the Hoffman case.
�bullet	Chloe and Chance are in a serious relationship and Chloe was by his side during the ceremony.
�bullet	Billy and Mac have been having issues and Mac finds out that Billy slept with Kelly.
�bullet	Daniel is in legal trouble and his loved ones are trying to figure out how to help him. Phyllis suggests that he might want to think about leaving the country.

• Billy is working on a cover story and needs to finish a plug, but Victoria is feeling unwell. She thinks she might be experiencing morning sickness.
• Kevin has lost track of Delia and finds her hiding behind a chair. They discuss making their Christmas cards at the Christmas tree lot.
• Lily and Jill are discussing Christmas memories with their children. Lily's husband, Cane, is working late and Lily wishes he could have more memories like this with their own children.
• Cane is working on a market analysis for Tucker and Sofia assigns him a feasibility study for a short-haul concept.
• Phyllis is taking care of Daisy, who is pregnant with Daniel's child. Daisy's baby is kicking and Phyllis feels the movements.
• Cane is concerned about Tucker doing a background check on Blake, who is using a false name and fake references.
• Daniel and Phyllis are discussing Daisy and the baby. Daniel is worried about the impact of Daisy on his sister, Summer.
• Chloe and Kevin are taking a Christmas photo with Delia. A woman from child protective services approaches and accuses them of taking inappropriate photos with Delia.

• Hilary and Devon have a disagreement about her role in their TV show, with Hilary wanting more control and a higher salary.
• Billy visits his sisters Traci and Ashley on Christmas Eve, bringing them presents and spending time with them.
• Jack and Billy have a confrontation when Billy stops by to drop off presents for his sisters, with Jack refusing to let him in.
• Phyllis tells Lauren that she is leaving Jabot and is interested in working for Fenmore's, and Lauren is excited to have her on board.

• Adam is informed by his grandmother, Constance, that his father did not die of a heart attack as he had been told, but instead committed suicide due to the hostile takeover of his company by Newman Enterprises.

• Billy is upset that Victoria wants their daughter, Katie, to have the Newman last name, feeling that it is a sign that his relationship with Victoria is truly over.

• Faith is struggling with the fact that her parents are not getting back together, and has run away in an attempt to bring them back together.

• Avery's application to have the warehouse district designated as a historical landmark has been denied, making it more difficult to save the buildings from demolition.

• Victor has been given control of Chancellor Industries, which Jill believes he conned Katherine Chancellor out of.

• Joe is representing the investors in a warehouse-redevelopment project and is attempting to get Victor to use his reputation to draw in other investors.

• Dylan asks Mariah for help with a case and brings Sharon a Christmas present.

• Reed is arrested after being caught drinking and driving, and Mattie calls the police.
• Jill sells Chancellor Industries to Jack, but later changes her mind after hearing about the situation at Jabot.
• Jack is no longer the CEO of Jabot due to a no-confidence vote from the board, but he is still planning to purchase Chancellor Industries.
• Cane is hesitant about the purchase of Chancellor Industries by Jabot, as he is concerned about the company's stability.
• Ashley is trying to persuade the board to adopt common-sense measures while they sort through the situation at Jabot.
• Victoria receives a call from the police informing her that Reed has been arrested.
